business_rule: Trade Settlement Date: This field is required and cannot be empty
Trade Settlement Date: Settlement date must be a valid business day
Trade Settlement Date: Date cannot be more than 30 days in the past
CUSIP Identifier: CUSIP must be 9 characters
CUSIP Identifier: CUSIP cannot be null
CUSIP Identifier: CUSIP must contain only uppercase alphanumeric characters
Account Classification Type: Value must be chosen from the approved list of account types
Account Classification Type: This field is required
Counterparty Credit Rating: Rating must be one of: AAA, AA, A, BBB, BB, B, CCC, CC, C, D
Counterparty Credit Rating: This field is required only if counterparty type is external
Counterparty Credit Rating: Rating must be from a recognized agency
Portfolio Net Asset Value: Value must be greater than 1
Portfolio Net Asset Value: NAV cannot be negative
Regulatory Reporting Flag: This field is required
Regulatory Reporting Flag: Value must be TRUE or FALSE
Broker Dealer ID: The value must be chosen from an approved list of registered broker dealers
Broker Dealer ID: This field is required only if trade type is agency
Market Cap Tier: Value must be one of: Large Cap, Mid Cap, Small Cap, Micro Cap
Market Cap Tier: This field cannot be null
Dividend Yield Percentage: Value must be between 0 and 100
Dividend Yield Percentage: Yield must be a valid percentage value between 0 and 100
Maturity Date: This field is required only if asset type is fixed income
Maturity Date: Date must be after issue date
Maturity Date: Maturity date must be at least 1 year after issue date
Trade Execution Venue: Venue must be selected from list of approved exchanges
Trade Execution Venue: Venue cannot be empty
LEI Code: LEI must be exactly 20 alphanumeric characters
LEI Code: This field is required for institutional counterparties only
ESG Score: ESG Score must be between 0 and 100
ESG Score: ESG score should be from 0 to 100
ESG Score: ESG Score cannot be null
Sustainability Rating: Rating must be one of: A, B, C, D, E
Sustainability Rating: This field is required for ESG-focused funds only
Carbon Footprint: Value must be a positive number
Carbon Footprint: Carbon footprint must be greater than or equal to 0
